00142     class process_base {
00143     public:
00144       typedef boost::shared_ptr<process_base> sptr;
00145       virtual ~process_base() {}
00146       virtual bool is_running() const { return true; }
00147       virtual int process(const void *input_buffer, 
00148                           void *output_buffer,
00149                           unsigned long frames_per_buffer,
00150                           callback_info::sptr info) {
00151         std::cout << "process_base callback called " << frames_per_buffer << " " << info->to_string() << std::endl;
00152         return paContinue;
00153       }
00154     } ;
